T02D3241:10a-1: badzra shrim kh'a la s'a dha nam /
T02D3241:10a-3: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3241:10a-4: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3241:10a-5: sngar bshad pa'i cho ga'i rim pas /
T02D3241:10a-6: snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge h'um
T02D3241:10a-7: ljang gu'i ye shes nges par rdzogs pa las rdo
T02D3241:10a-8: rje lcags sgrog ma zhal gsum phyag drug ma ste
T02D3241:10a-9: / mthing nag dang dkar po ni g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal lo //
T02D3241:10a-10: spyan gsum ma rdo rje dang rdo rje dang rdo
T02D3241:10a-11: rje lcags thag dang mda' dang ldan pa ni g-yas
T02D3241:10b-1: sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa dang /
T02D3241:10b-2: gzhu dang ldan pa ni g-yon pa'i phyag gsum mo //
T02D3241:10b-4: zhal cung zad bzhad pa dang ldan pa /
T02D3241:10b-5: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3241:10b-6: ma rungs pa'i sems can gtan nas 'joms par mdzad
T02D3241:10b-7: par bdag nyid bsgoms la phyag rgya bcing bar bya
T02D3241:10b-8: ste / lag pa gnyis so sor rdo rje khu
T02D3241:10b-9: tshur du byas la mthe'u chung gnyis dang mdzub mo
T02D3241:10b-10: gnyis kyang lcags thag gi rnam par mdun par bya
T02D3241:10b-11: ste / ba'o // aom badzra shrim kha le h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3241:10b-12: zhes bya ba ni bzlas pa'i sngags so //
T02D3241:10b-13: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i sgrub thabs so /
